member.name: T:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfig
member.summary: Represents configuration for and .

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfig.DiscordBranch
member.summary: Sets which branch of Discord API to use. Typically, you should not change this value.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfig.Token
member.summary: Sets the token used to identify the client.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfig.TokenType
member.summary: Sets the type of the token used to identify the client. This is typically for bots, and for selfbots and userbots.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfig.LogLevel
member.summary: Sets the maximum logging level for messages. Typically, the default value of is ok for most uses.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfig.UseInternalLogHandler
member.summary: Sets whether to use the internal log handler. This is disabled by default. Use it if you don't want to provide your own log handlers.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfig.LargeThreshold
member.summary: Sets the member count threshold at which guilds are considered large.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfig.AutoReconnect
member.summary: Sets whether to automatically reconnect in case a connection is lost.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfig.ShardId
member.summary: Sets the ID of the shard to connect to. If not sharding, or sharding automatically, this value should be left default.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfig.ShardCount
member.summary: Sets the total number of shards the bot is on. If not sharding, this value should be left default. If sharding automatically, this value will indicate how many shards to boot. If left default for automatic sharding, the client will determine the shard count automatically.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfig.EnableCompression
member.summary: Sets whether to enable compression for gateway communication. Disabling this option will increase size of certain dispatches, and might increase login time.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfig.MessageCacheSize
member.summary: Sets the size of the per-channel message cache. Setting this to 0 will disable message caching completely. Do note that large cache will increase RAM usage drastically.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.DiscordConfig.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new configuration with default values.

member.summary: Creates a clone of another discord configuration.

member.summary: Represents guild verification level.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.VerificationLevel.None
member.summary: No verification. Anyone can join and chat right away.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.VerificationLevel.Low
member.summary: Low verification level. Users are required to have a verified email attached to their account in order to be able to chat.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.VerificationLevel.Medium
member.summary: Medium verification level. Users are required to have a verified email attached to their account, and account age need to be at least 5 minutes in order to be able to chat.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.VerificationLevel.High
member.summary: ( verification level. Users are required to have a verified email attached to their account, account age need to be at least 5 minutes, and they need to be in the server for at least 10 minutes in order to be able to chat.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.VerificationLevel.Highest
member.summary: () verification level. Users are required to have a verified phone number attached to their account.
